name: Summer Solstice
description:
Summer always knew the Summer Solstice Rituals were important, but when they failed and her best friend got hurt they became an obsession. 

You play as Summer completing the Summer Solstice Rituals through a series of battles and mini-games.

Currently, this is a demo

(Still receiving bug fixes occasionally but hopefully no game-breaking bugs)

5 mini-games to play

3 main quests 

Various side quests 

9 Boss fights

4 possible party members

6 main areas to explore
